728586f-a.title: Richmond: Bell Street - Smith Street
728586f-a.text:
13 Bell Street, north side, between Smith Street and White Plain
Ave. (Rosebank). The view is eastward. Bell Street was formerly
Wall Street.
July 12, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
728586f-a.folder: Bell Street & Smith Street, Staten Island, NY

729235f-a.title: Richmond: Oak Street - Bell Street
729235f-a.text:
Oak Street, east aide, at Bell Street, showing a pigeon
coop.
July 17, 1934
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODU)TIONS
